title: Kate Wright flaunts incredible figure in minuscule crop top on post wedding hike
text:

Kate Wright is clearly pining for some winter sun as she shared a stunning throwback from her wedding break in Turkey.

The former TOWIE star tied the knot with beau Rio Ferdinand last month in an idyllic beach side ceremony.

After the celebrations were over, the new Mrs Ferdinand didn't wait for too long to get back to her exercise regime.

Fitness fanatic Kate stuck on a pair of trainers, shorts and tiny crop top to work up a sweat on an uphill hike after her big day.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Sharing the pics of her workout to Instagram , Kate wrote "Missing the holiday hikes .... and the weather. This mornings workout wasn’t quite the same ☔️ Love to walk & hike... especially in the sun ☀️ " along with the hashtag, the hashtag 'fitterhappierheatlhier.

Kate - who recently changed her surname to Ferdinand on the social media site - was instantly inundated with praise from her fans.

Some even suggested that Kate should sign up to this year's I'm A Celebrity as she looked so at home in the great outdoors.

Last week Kate revealed that she even went to the gym to workout on the morning of her wedding.

"Loads of people asking did I train the morning of the wedding .... of course I bl**dy DID," she joked.

"It’s not just about the body it’s about the mind ... going into the best day of my life feeling focused and happy."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

From her endless array of skimpy bikinis to her corseted wedding gown, Kate was happy to show off the results of her hard work during her wedding break to Turkey.

Kate and former footballer Rio tied the knot at the £4000 a night D Maris Bay resort in Marmaris Bay, Turkey, last month.
description: Kate Wright didn't want to put her fitness regime on hold - even on her idyllic wedding break with Rio Ferdinand
